name: My Little Piece of Shelby
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 52 by Roberto Romao
(This is a prototype so some features may not being working  like the irrigation functon, but feel free to Play and test it)

Once Upon a Time, in the Mystical lands of Ontario, Canada...

After a long period of unemployment and debt our hero received an offer to work on an abandoned farm plot in the distant city of Shelby, Ontario. Work the land and use the profits to pay your debt!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls 

(WASD Move)
(E interact)
(J Car interaction)
